alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 4:04PM CST until January 06 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. North winds of 15 to 20 MPH are expected along with gusts to around 25 MPH. * WHERE...Gosper, Phelps, Harlan, Furnas and Dawson Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon Wednesday to 6 AM CST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM Wednesday to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Blowing and drifting snow could reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
